# ============================================================= Target ============================================================= #

# Add library
add_library(fmt INTERFACE)

# ========================================================== Configuration ========================================================= #

# Set headers-only build of the library
target_compile_definitions(fmt
    INTERFACE
        FMT_HEADER_ONLY=1
)

# #============================================================ Sources ============================================================ #

# Add project code
target_include_directories(fmt
    INTERFACE
        $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include>
)
